title: Purpose
context: ยง431:1-100.5 Purpose. The legislature hereby declares that the purpose of this chapter is to recodify, without substantive change, the insurance law in effect immediately prior to July 1, 1988. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2] Revision Note &ldquo;July 1, 1988&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this chapter&rdquo;.
